name: Cal's Costume Conundrum!!
description:
Cal Montgomery has been assigned a homework assignment of the highest importance: writing about her favorite Halloween costume! Conveniently, her siblings are hosting a Halloween party downstairs. All she needs to do is head down there, interview all the guests, and decide which is her favorite!

Genres:
Family, cute, comedy

Features:

6k words, 10 endings, partial voice acting
